title: Bioinspired chitosan based functionalization of biomedical implant surfaces for enhanced hemocompatibility, antioxidation and anticoagulation potential: an in silico and in vitro study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20691-20713
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00796D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sadia Hassan, Namra Bilal, Tooba Javaid Khan, Murtaza Najabat Ali, Bakhtawar Ghafoor, Khawaja Usman Saif
Mitigating thrombosis and adverse reactions in biomedical implants necessitates exploration of natural biomaterials with enhanced hemocompatibility and anticoagulation potential including natural drug-loaded chitosan based matrixes.
